rooms.desc: There is a door in front of you.
There is a door in front of you.
You are in a narrow corridor with many doors, but there is a special door at the far end of the corridor.

You are in a white room with many TV screens. An old man turns around and says 'I am the architect...' he goes on to speak in a very monotone voice and with many unnecessarily complex words so I'll skip all that. Anyway there are two doors, one to your left and one to your right.
You are outdoors, in a street lined with many agents. It is raining very heavily.

objects.desc: It is a normal hand gun.
It looks totally harmless. But have you seen this cat before?

enemies.desc: The agent is wearing sunglasses and an earpiece.
enemies.unsuccessful_kill_msg: You are overpowered by the agent and get killed.
enemies.unsuccessful_escape_msg: You ignored the agent but he killed you.

enemies.successful_kill_msg: You defeated some of them with your bare hands (coz you know kung-fu!) and while your teammates (yes you have teammates, I forgot to mention that bit) engage the others, you see that door is open.
enemies.unsuccessful_escape_msg: You try going to the door straight but there are too many agents and they killed you.

enemies.desc: You met him many times before. He is very angry.
enemies.intro_msg: Agent Smith is standing in the middle of the street.
enemies.successful_kill_msg: After a dragonball style fight you eventually won!
